item.title: WE MUST CONTINUE THE FIGHT! Endurance in Lawfare: A Special Legal Update ft. James S.M. Kitchen [Open Mike with Michael Thiessen]
item.description:
OPEN MIKE w/Michael Thiessen ~ September 15, 2023
On this week's episode of OPEN MIKE, Dr. Thiessen is joined by LCC Chief Litigator James S.M. Kitchen to talk about the recent legal victory for Josh Alexander and the necessity of continued endurance in lawfare.

Episode Resource: Court Document (Josh Alexander v. RCCDSB): https://libertycoalitioncanada.com/wp-content/uploads/2023/01/Josh-Alexander-v-RCCDSB-2023-ONSC-4962-August-31-2023.pdf; Josh Alexander's Twitter: https://twitter.com/officialJosh_A; Save Canada Linktree: https://linktr.ee/save_canada;

SUPPORT OUR LEGAL ADVOCACY - Help us defend Canadians' God-given rights and liberties: https://libertycoalitioncanada.com/donate/; https://libertycoalitioncanada.com/liberty-defense-fund/our-legal-strategy/;

item.title: Kelowna Wild Fires ft. Pastor Ross Odnokon [Open Mike with Michael Thiessen]
item.description:
OPEN MIKE w/Michael Thiessen ~ September 08, 2023
On this week's episode of OPEN MIKE, Dr. Thiessen is joined by the Lead Pastor of Redeemer Baptist Church in Kelowna, B.C., Ross Odnokon, to talk about the recent Kelowna wildfires, climate change, and discerning truth from lies. 

Episode Resource: Redeemer Baptist Church (Kelowna, B.C.): https://redeemerbaptist.ca/about/leadership; "Residents Returning to Devastation from Wildfire in B.C.'s Shuswap" | CTV News: https://bc.ctvnews.ca/residents-returning-to-devastation-from-wildfire-in-b-c-s-shuswap-1.6550843.

item.title: France is on Fire: On the Ground in France ft. Steven Lloyd [Open Mike with Michael Thiessen]
item.description:
OPEN MIKE w/Michael Thiessen ~ August 26, 2023
On this week's episode of OPEN MIKE, Dr. Thiessen is joined by pastor and missionary to France, Steven Lloyd, to talk about just what's happening in France. It's a secular nation in tumult, a nation hostile to the cause of Christ, a nation reaping what it has sown.

Episode Resource: "French Riots Have Resulted in Thousands of Convictions: Justice Minister" | RFI: https://www.rfi.fr/en/france/20230829-french-riots-have-resulted-in-thousands-of-convictions-justice-minister; "Inside France’s 2023 Riots" | Politico: https://www.politico.com/news/magazine/2023/07/07/french-riots-banlieues-00105143.
